page.title: 12VIEWS OF FLEETWOOD:Residents
page.content: When{residents}were interviewed in Memorial Park they gave these impressions of Fleetwood, verbatim: {"}The best things are the park and the nice, friendly people{"};{"}I like its free and easy life{"};{"}-people are friendly{"};{"}It's a very pleasant town and the people are very kind. I just wish we could get rid of all the vandals{"};{"}It's a friendly town and they{are}improving places " ;{"}The atmosphere is very peaceful; it's Nature-wise{"};{"}I would like Fleetwood to stay as it is without attracting too many outsiders{"};{"}-a very pleasant life in Fleetwood{"};{"} It's a healthy town{"};{"}It's quiet and pleasant{"};{"}The atmosphere and life in Fleetwood are very pleasant{"} ;{"}I've lived here for fifty years and it makes me feel as if I'm still sixteen{"}.{Life is as you find it!!
